ygData.subject: languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Hours?  it shouldn t take THAT long. Tips for learning a language within 20mins: -- find someone who is excellent in the language you need -- have that
ygData.messageBody:
Hours? it shouldn't take THAT long.

Tips for learning a language within 20mins:

-- find someone who is "excellent" in the language you need
-- have that person use a hotkey setup with all 5 lines filled in so that
you get spamed 5 times each time he/she hits the key.
-- spam away.

Learned Gnome to Excellent once just travelling across the boat. I learned
both Old Erudian and Combine just sitting 20 mins each with somebody too.
It goes real fast.

-- Lim'Dul

>Message: 2
Date: Sun, 13 Jun 1999 20:53:34 +0100
From: "Mry" <mry@...>
>Subject: Re: Spells

>I have just reached lvl 16 and now have the task of getting runes to make
>my
>spells. I gather I need to learn other languages to read the books, I sat
>talking to another player to learn gnomish and over an hour it increased
>about 7
>times. Is there some special way of learning this better or is there a list
>that
>contains the rune combinations as finding someone to talk to for hours is
>very
hard.

Mryius
